name: Hadoop How To
tagline: Short, targeted, guides to all things Hadoop
body:
### In order to inspect work node logs in a Hadoop cluster that is behind a firewall with only SSH access, a browser must be setup for tunneling.

[Using a browser to tunnel into a Hadoop cluster to inspect worker node logs](browserTunneling/browserTunneling.html)

### Hadoop MapReduce can write key/value output to HDFS in a variety of formats. Here is how to display them.

[Display Your MapReduce Output](displayOutput/displayOutput.html)

### MRUnit supports two different input/output methods, add and with.  Here is the difference.

[MRUnit: with vs. add](withMRUnit/withMRUnit.html)

### This final part of a four-part series shows how to use AVRO to pass multiple values between mapper and reducer, and from the reducer to output.

[Passing Multiple Values in MapReduce Part 4: AVRO](AVROMultipleValues/AVROMultipleValues.html)

### This third of a four-part series shows how to use a MapWritable to pass multiple values between the mapper and reducer, and from the reducer to output.

[Passing Multiple Values in MapReduce Part 3: Maps](mapMultipleValues/mapMultipleValues.html)

### This second of a four-part series shows how to use a custom writable to pass multiple values between mapper and reducer, and from the reducer to output.

[Passing Multiple Values in MapReduce Part 2: Custom Writables](writableMultipleValues/writableMultipleValues.html)

### This first of a four-part series shows how to use a string to pass multiple values between mapper and reducer, and from the reducer to output.

[Passing Multiple Values in MapReduce Part 1: Strings](stringMultipleValues/stringMultipleValues.html)


### Using the software lifecycle and build tool Maven, you can configure Eclipse for Hadoop development in minutes.

[Setup Eclipse for Hadoop Development Using Maven](hadoopMaven/hadoopMaven.html)

----

### Questions about this material?  
[Hadoop Concepts Forum](http://community.cloudera.com/t5/Apache-Hadoop-Concepts-and/bd-p/ApacheHadoopConcepts)
